description.translate: In great rumblings, you go on your way.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Jambes infatiguables\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7En de grands grondements,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7se poursuit ta route.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7In great rumblings,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7you go on your way.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7RES§c-1\"}"],color:2127385}}
